page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area includes the eastern edge of{Brentwood}as well as large parts of {Shenfield}and{Hutton.}In the south is part of the village of{Ingrave . About a third of the total area is residential. This is characterised by expensive low-density housing. There are 2 council estates. The main commercial and shopping area is close to Shenfield Station. Many people work in London and commute from here. There are a considerable number of recreational facilities, private and public, as well as several patches of woodland (some like Hart's wood and Shenfield Common for public enjoyment). Just under half the area is farmland, the vast majority being arable, growing cereals.
